attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that the application fee is rising to £245 through no fault of the industry employees, I think now is the time to abolish a certain security governing body and find a new regulatory body to govern the industry. I think that another £245 on top of your course fees (£200 upwards) is too much, it doesnt even guarantee you your licence. If you agree, please, You know what to do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
